sentences.sContent: So my primary school grade one, but also for the first time on school so successfully concluded.
sentences.sContent_eng: So my primary school grade one, but also for the first time on school so successfully concluded.
sentences.sCn: 就这样我的小学一年级，也是平生第一次上学堂就这样圆满结束。

sentences.sContent: But for the teacher of the primary school where his little boy was going to have his first day.
sentences.sContent_eng: But for the teacher of the primary school where his little boy was going to have his first day.
sentences.sCn: 但是对于这位小学老师来说，他今天要给那里的小男孩们上第一堂课。

sentences.sContent: It is not acceptable for a child to finish primary school and not know what periods are or what they should do if they are abused.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is not acceptable for a child to finish primary school and not know what periods are or what they should do if they are abused.
sentences.sCn: 让一个小孩小学毕业了，却不知道月经是什么，也不知道如果他们受虐了该怎么做是让人不能接受的。

trans.tranOther: a school for children between 5 and 11 years old in England and Wales
